arabicText: ۞ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فِىٓ أَيَّامٍۢ مَّعْدُودَٰتٍۢ ۚ فَمَن تَعَجَّلَ فِى يَوْمَيْنِ فَلَآ إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ وَمَن تَأَخَّرَ فَلَآ إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ لِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰ ۗ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	Allah in	the	counted	days;	
so	 whoever	 hastens	 by	 departing	 in	 two	
days,	there	is	no	sin	on	him;	and	whoever	
stays	 on,	 there	is	 no	 sin	 for	 him	- for	 the	
pious;	 and	 keep	 fearing	 Allah,	 and	 know	
well	that	it	is	to	Him	you	will	be	raised.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 ki	 yād	 karo	 gine	 huwe	 dinoñ	
meiñ to	 jo	 jaldi	 karke	 do	 din	 meiñ	 chalā	
jāye	us	par	kuchh	gunah	nahi

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُعْجِبُكَ قَوْلُهُۥ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَيُشْهِدُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا فِى قَلْبِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَلَدُّ ٱلْخِصَامِ
englishTranslationText:
And	 among	 men	 is	 one	 whose	
conversation	may	please	you	in	the	life	of	
this	world,	and	he	brings	Allah as	witness	
to	what	is	in	his	heart,	whereas	he	is	 the	
biggest	quarreller!
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 jo	 reh	 jāye	 to	 us	 par	 gunāh	 nahi	
parhez-gār	ke	liye	aur	Allah	se	darte	raho	
aur	 jān	 rakho	 ke	 tumheiñ	 usi	 ki	 taraf	
uthna	hai

arabicText: وَإِذَا تَوَلَّىٰ سَعَىٰ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيُفْسِدَ فِيهَا وَيُهْلِكَ ٱلْحَرْثَ وَٱلنَّسْلَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْفَسَادَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 he	 turns	 away,	 he	 creates	
turmoil	 in	 the	 earth	 and	 destroys	 crops	
and	 lives;	 and	 Allah is	 not	 pleased	 with	
turmoil.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 b’az	 ādmi	 woh	 hai	 ke	 duniya	 ki	
zindagi	meiñ	uski	bāt	tujhe	bhali	lage	aur	
apne	 dil	 ki	 bāt	 par	 Allah	 ko	 gawāh	 lāye	
aur	woh	sabse	bada	jhagdālu	hai.

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتْهُ ٱلْعِزَّةُ بِٱلْإِثْمِ ۚ فَحَسْبُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُ ۚ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	it	is	said	to	him,	“Fear	Allah”,	he	
becomes	more	resolute	in	committing	sin	
- therefore	 hell	is	 sufficient	 for	 such;	and	
that	 is	 indeed,	 a	 very	 wretched	 resting	
place.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	peeth	phere	to	zameen	meiñ	fasād	
dālta	phire	aur	kheti	aur	jāneiñ	tabāh	kare	
aur	Allah	fasād	se	rāzi	nahi

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتْهُ ٱلْعِزَّةُ بِٱلْإِثْمِ ۚ فَحَسْبُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُ ۚ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
englishTranslationText:
And	among	men	is	 one	who	 sells	 himself	
to	seek	the	pleasure	of	Allah;	and	Allah is	
Most	 Compassionate	 towards	 the	
bondmen.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	usse	 kahā	jāye	 ke	Allah	 se	dar	 to	
usey	 aur	 zid	 chadhe	 gunāh	 ki	 aise	 ko	
dozakh	 kāfi	 hai	 aur	 woh	 zaroor	 bahut	
bura	bichauna	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ فِى ٱلسِّلْمِ كَآفَّةًۭ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Enter	Islam	in	full	-
and	do	not	follow	the	footsteps	of	the	devil;	indeed	he	is	your	open	enemy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	koi	ādmi	apni	jān	bechta	hai	Allah	ki	
marzi	chāhne	meiñ	aur	Allah	bandoñ	par	
maherbān	 hai	 aey	 Imān	 wālo	islām	meiñ	
pooore	dākhil	ho	aur	shaitān	ke	qadamoñ	
par	na	chalo	beshak	woh	tumhāra	khula	dushman	hai

arabicText: فَإِن زَلَلْتُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْكُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	renege,	even	after	the	clear	commands	have	come	to	you,	then	know	well	that	Allah
is	Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	is	ke	b'ad	bhi	bichlo (Behko) ke	tumhāre	pās	raushan	hukm	āa	chuke	to	jān	lo	ke	Allah	
zabardast	hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى ظُلَلٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْغَمَامِ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَقُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
englishTranslationText:
What	 are	 they	 waiting	 for,	 except	 that	 Allah’s	 punishment	 should	 come	 through	 stretched	
clouds	and	 the	angels	 descend	and	 the	matter	 be	 finished?	And	all	matters	are	 directed	 only	
towards	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kāhe	ke	intezār	meiñ	haiñ	magar	 yahi	Allah	ka	‘azab	āaye	chhāye	huwe	bādloñ	meiñ	 farishte	
utreiñ	aur	kām	ho	chuke	aur	sab	kāmoñ ki	ruju’Allah	hi	ki	taraf		hai

arabicText: سَلْ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ كَمْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍۭ بَيِّنَةٍۢ ۗ وَمَن يُبَدِّلْ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Ask	 the	 Descendants	 of	 Israel	 how	many	
clear	 signs	 We	 gave	 them;	 and	 whoever	
alters	 Allah’s	 favour	 which	 came	 to	 him,	
then	indeed	Allah’s	punishment	is	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bani	 Isra’il	 se	 poocho	 ham	 ne	 kitni	
raushan	 nishāniyāñ	 unheiñ	 deiñ	 aur	 jo	
Allah	 ki	 āyi	 huwi	 ne'mat	 ko	 badal	 de	 to	
beshak Allah	ka	‘azāb	sakht	hai.

arabicText: زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۘ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
The	 life	 of	 this	 world	 is	 made	 to	 appear	
beautiful	 in	 the	 sight	 of	 the	 disbelievers,	
and	 they	 make	 fun	 of	 the	 believers;	 and	
the	 pious	will	 be	 above	 them	 on	 the	Day	
of	 Resurrection;	 and	 Allah may	 give	 to	
whomever	He	wills,	without	account.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kāfiroñ	 ki	 nigah	 meiñ	 duniya	 ki	 zindagi	
arāsta	 ki	 gyi	 aur	 Musalmānoñ	 se	 hañste	
haiñ	 aur	 dar	 wāle	 unse	 upar	 hoñge	
Qiyamat	 ke	 din	 aur	 Khuda	 jise	 chāhe	 be	
ginti	de

arabicText: كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ فَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ وَأَنزَلَ مَعَهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ فِيمَا ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَا ٱخْتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ بَغْيًۢا بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ فَهَدَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لِمَا ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
englishTranslationText:
Mankind	 was	 on	 one	 religion;	 so	 Allah
sent	 Prophets	 giving	 glad	 tidings	 and	
warnings	- and	with	 them	 sent	 down	 the	
true	 Book	 to	 judge	 between	 mankind	 on	
their	differences;	and	only	those	to	whom	
it	 was	 given	 created	 disputes	 regarding	
the	Book,	after	clear	commands	had	come	
to	them,	due	to	hostility	of	one	another;	so	
Allah,	 by	 His	 command,	 made	 the	 truth	
clear	 to	 the	 believers,	 concerning	 their	
disputes;	and	Allah may	guide	whomever	
He	wills	to	the	Straight Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Log	ek	deen	par	they	phir	Allah	ne	Añbiya	
bheje	 khush-khabri	 dete	 aur	 dar	 sunāte	
aur	 unke	 sāth	 sachchi	 kitāb	 utāri	 ke	woh	
logoñ	meiñ	unke	ikhtilāfoñ	ka	faisla	karde	
aur	kitāb	meiñ	ikhtilāf	unhiñ	ne	dāla	jinko	
di	gayi	 thi	b'ād	iske	 ke	unke	pās	 raushan	
hukm	 āa	 chuke	 āapas	 ki	 sarkashi	 se	 to	
Allah	 ne	 Imān	 wāloñ	 ko	 woh	 Haq	 bāt
sujha	 di	 jis	 meiñ	 jhagad	 rahe	 they	 apne	
hukm	 se	 aur	 Allah	 jise	 chāhe	 seedhi	 rāh	
dikhāye.

arabicText: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تَدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِكُم مَّثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوْا۟ مِن قَبْلِكُم ۖ مَّسَّتْهُمُ ٱلْبَأْسَآءُ وَٱلضَّرَّآءُ وَزُلْزِلُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ مَتَىٰ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ نَصْرَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Are	 you	 under	 the	 illusion	 that	 you	 will	
enter	 Paradise	 whereas	 the	 suffering,	
which	 came	 to	 those	 before	 you,	 has	 not	
yet	come	 to	 you?	Hardship	and	adversity	
befell	 them	and	 they	were	 shaken,	 to	 the	
extent	 that	 the	Noble	 Messenger	 and	 the	
believers	along	with	him	said,	“When	will	
the	help	of	Allah come?”;	pay	heed!	Allah’s	
help	is	surely	near
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kya	 is	 gumān	 meiñ	 ho	 ke	 jannat	 meiñ	
chale	 jāoge	 aur	 abhi	 tum	 par	 agloñ	 ki	 si	
rudād	na	āayi	pahoñchi	unheiñ	sakhti	aur	
shiddat	aur	hila	hila	dāle	gye	yahāñ	tak	ke	
keh	 utha	 Rasool	 aur	 uske	 sāth	 ke	 Imān	
wāle	 jab	 āyegi	 Allah	 ki	 madad	 sun	 lo	
beshak	Allah	ki	madad	qareeb	hai.

arabicText: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنفِقُونَ ۖ قُلْ مَآ أَنفَقْتُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ فَلِلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ وَٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ ۗ وَمَا تَفْعَلُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. They	ask	you	what	 they	should	spend;	say,	 “Whatever	you	spend	 for	good,	is	 for	parents	and	
near	relatives	and	orphans	and	the	needy	and	the	traveller”;	and	whatever	good	you	do,	indeed	
Allah knows	it
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	se	poochte	haiñ	kya	kharch	kareiñ	tum	farmao	jo	kuchh	māl	neki	meiñ	kharch	karo	to	woh	
māñ		bāp	aur	qareeb	ke	risht-e-dāroñ	aur	yateemoñ	aur	mohtājoñ	aur	rāh-geer	ke	liye	hai	aur	
jo	bhalāi	karo	beshak	Allah	use	jānta	hai.

arabicText: كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْقِتَالُ وَهُوَ كُرْهٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تَكْرَهُوا۟ شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تُحِبُّوا۟ شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُوَ شَرٌّۭ لَّكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Fighting	 in	 Allah's	 cause	 is	 ordained	 for	
you,	whereas	it	is	disliked	by	you;	and	it	is	
possible	 that	 you	 hate	 a	 thing	 which	 is	
better	 for	you;	and	it	is	possible	 that	you	
like	 a	 thing	 which	 is	 bad	 for	 you;	 and	
Allah knows,	and	you	do	not	know
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	par	farz	hua	khuda	ki	rāh	meiñ	ladna	
aur	woh	tumheiñ	na-gawār	hai	aur	qareeb	
hai	ke	koi	bāt	 tumheiñ	buri	lage	aur	woh	
tumhāre	 haq	 meiñ	 behtar	 ho	 aur	 qareeb	
hai	 ke	 koi	 bāt	 tumheiñ	 pasand	 āye	 aur	
woh	 tumhāre	haq	meiñ	buri	ho	aur	Allah	
jānta	hai	aur	tum	nahi	jānte

arabicText: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلشَّهْرِ ٱلْحَرَامِ قِتَالٍۢ فِيهِ ۖ قُلْ قِتَالٌۭ فِيهِ كَبِيرٌۭ ۖ وَصَدٌّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَكُفْرٌۢ بِهِۦ وَٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ وَإِخْرَاجُ أَهْلِهِۦ مِنْهُ أَكْبَرُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱلْفِتْنَةُ أَكْبَرُ مِنَ ٱلْقَتْلِ ۗ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَرُدُّوكُمْ عَن دِينِكُمْ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ ۚ وَمَن يَرْتَدِدْ مِنكُمْ عَن دِينِهِۦ فَيَمُتْ وَهُوَ كَافِرٌۭ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	 ask	 you	 the	 decree	 regarding	
fighting	in	 the	sacred	month;	say	(O	 dear	
Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	
be	upon	him),	“Fighting	in	it	is	a	great	sin;	
and	to	prevent	from	the	way	of	Allah,	and	
not	 to	 believe	 in	 Him	 and	 to	 prevent	
(people)	 from	 the	 Sacred	 Masjid and	 to	
expel	its	residents	- these	are	greater	sins	
before	Allah";	and	 the	 turmoil	 they	cause	
is	 worse	 than	 killing;	 and	 they	 will	 keep	
fighting	 you	 till	 they	 turn	 you	away	 from	
your	 religion,	 if	 they	 can;	 and	 whoever	
among	 you	 turns	 renegade	 and	 dies	 as	 a	
disbeliever,	 then	 their	 deeds	 are	 wasted	
in	 this	 world	 and	 in	 the	 Hereafter;	 and	
they	 are	 the	 people	 of	 hell;	 they	 will	
remain	in	it	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tum	 se	 poochte	 haiñ	Mah-e-Harām	meiñ	
ladne	ka	hukm	 tum	 farmao	is	meiñ	ladna	
bada	gunāh	hai	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	se	roñkna	
aur	 us	 par	 Imān	 na	 lāna	 aur	 Masjid-eHarām se	 roñkna	 aur	 uske	 basne	 wāloñ	
ko	nikāl	dena	Allah	ke	nazdeek	yeh	gunāh	
is	se	bhi	bade	haiñ	aur	inka	 fasād	qatl	se	
sakht	 tar	 hai	 aur	 hamesha	 tum	 se	 ladte	
raheñge	 yahāñ	 tak	 ke	 tumheiñ	 tumhāre	
deen	se	pher	deiñ	agar	ban	pade	aur	tum	
meiñ	jo	koi	apne	deen	se	phire	phir	kāfir	
hokar	 mare	 to	 un	 logoñ	 ka	 kiya	 akārat	
gaya	 duniya	 meiñ	 aur	 ākhirat	 meiñ	 aur	
woh	 dozakh	 wāle	 haiñ	 unheiñ	 us	 meiñ	
hamesha	rahna.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَرْجُونَ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 believed,	 and	 those	 who	
migrated	for	the	sake	of	Allah,	and	fought	
in	 Allah's	 cause	 - they	 are	 hopeful	 of	
gaining Allah’s	 mercy;	 and	 Allah is	 Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	woh	jinhoñ	ne	Allah	
ke	liye	apne	ghar	bār	chhode	aur	Allah	ki	
rāh	meiñ	lade	who	Rahmat-e-Ilāhi	ke	ummid-wār	haiñ	aur	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: ۞ يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْخَمْرِ وَٱلْمَيْسِرِ ۖ قُلْ فِيهِمَآ إِثْمٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ وَمَنَـٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَإِثْمُهُمَآ أَكْبَرُ مِن نَّفْعِهِمَا ۗ وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنفِقُونَ قُلِ ٱلْعَفْوَ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَفَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	 ask	 you	 the	 decree	 regarding	 wine	 (intoxicants)	 and	 gambling;	 say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“In	both	is	great	sin,	and	some	worldly	benefit	
for	men	- but	their	sin	is	greater	than	their	benefit”;	and	they	ask	you	what	they	should	spend;	
say,	“That	which	remains	spare	(surplus)”;	this	is	how	Allah explains	His	verses	to	you,	so	that	
you	may	think.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	se	sharāb	aur	juweñ	ka	hukm	poochte	haiñ	tum	farmā	do	ke	in	donoñ	meiñ	bada	gunāh	hai	
aur	logoñ	ke	kuchh	dunyavi	nafa'	bhi	aur	unka	gunāh	unke	nafa'	se	bada	hai	aur	tum	se	poochte	
haiñ	kya	kharch	kareiñ	tum	farmao	jo	fāzil	bache	isi	tarah	Allah	tum	se	āyateiñ	bayān	farmāta	
hai	ke	kaheeñ

arabicText: فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۗ وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ ۖ قُلْ إِصْلَاحٌۭ لَّهُمْ خَيْرٌۭ ۖ وَإِن تُخَالِطُوهُمْ فَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْمُفْسِدَ مِنَ ٱلْمُصْلِحِ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَعْنَتَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Before	 you	 execute	 your	 deeds	 of	 this	
world	and	 of	 the	Hereafter;	and	 they	ask	
you	 the	 decree	 regarding	 orphans;	 say,	
“To	do	good	towards	them	is	better;	and	if	
you	 combine	 your	 expenses	 with	 theirs,	
they	are	your	brothers”;	and	Allah knows	
very	 well	 the	 one	 who	 spoils	 from	 him	
who	 improves;	 and	 if	 Allah willed,	 He	
could	have	put	you	in	hardship;	and	Allah
is	Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	Duniya	aur	Ākhirat	ke	kām	soch	kar	
karo	 aur	 tum	 se	 yateemoñ	 ka	 mas'ala	
poochte	 haiñ	 tum	 farmao	 unka	 bhalā	
karna	 behtar	 hai	 aur	 agar	 apna	 unka	
kharch	mila	lo	 to	woh	 tumhāre	bhāi	haiñ	
aur	 khuda	 khoob	 jānta	 hai	 bigādne	 wāle
ko	 sawārne	 wāle	 se	 aur	 Allah	 chāhta	 to	
tumheiñ	 mashaqqat	 meiñ	 dālta	 beshak	
Allah	zabardast	hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۗ وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ ۖ قُلْ إِصْلَاحٌۭ لَّهُمْ خَيْرٌۭ ۖ وَإِن تُخَالِطُوهُمْ فَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	marry	polytheist	women	until	
they	 become	Muslims;	 for	 undoubtedly	 a	
Muslim	 bondwoman	 is	 better	 than	 a	
polytheist	woman,	although	you	may	like	
her;	 and	 do	 not	 give	 your	 women	 in	
marriage	 to	 polytheist	 men	 until	 they	
accept	 faith;	 for	 undoubtedly	 a	 Muslim	
slave	is	better	 than	a	polytheist,	although	
you	may	like	him;	they	invite	you	towards	
the	 fire;	 and	 Allah invites	 towards	
Paradise	 and	 forgiveness	 by	 His	
command;	 and	 explains	 His	 verses	 to	
mankind	 so	 that	 they	 may	 accept	
guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	shirk	wāli	aurtoñ	se	nikāh	na	karo	jab	
tak	 Musalman	 na	 ho	 jāyeñ	 aur	 beshak	
Musalman	 laundi	 mushrika	 se	 achchi	
agarche	tumheiñ	woh	bhāti	ho	mushrikoñ	
ke	 nikāh	 me	 na	 do	 jab	 tak	 woh	 Imān	 na	
lāyeiñ	 aur	 beshak	 Musalman	 ghulām	
mushrik	 se	 achha	 agarche	 woh	 tumheiñ	
bhāta	ho	woh	dozakh	ki	taraf		bulāte	haiñ	
aur	 Allah	 Jannat	 aur	 bakhshish	 ki	 taraf		
bulāta	hai	apne	hukm	se	aur	apni	Āyateiñ	
logoñ	 ke	 liye	 bayān	 karta	 hai	 ke	 kaheeñ	
woh	naseehat	māneñ

arabicText: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلْمَحِيضِ ۖ قُلْ هُوَ أَذًۭى فَٱعْتَزِلُوا۟ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فِى ٱلْمَحِيضِ ۖ وَلَا تَقْرَبُوهُنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَطْهُرْنَ ۖ فَإِذَا تَطَهَّرْنَ فَأْتُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ أَمَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلتَّوَّٰبِينَ وَيُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 ask	 you	 the	 decree	 concerning	
menstruation;	 say,	 “It	 is	 an	 impurity,	 so	
stay	away	from	women	at	such	times,	and	
do	not	cohabit	with	 them	until	 they	have	
cleansed	themselves;	so	when	they	have	cleansed	themselves,	cohabit	with	them	the	way	Allah
has	determined	 for	you”;	indeed	Allah loves	those	who	repent	profusely,	and	loves	those	who	
keep	clean.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	 se	 poochte	 haiñ	 haiz	 ka	 hukm	
Tum	farmao	woh	na-pāki	hai	to	aurtoñ	se	
alag	raho	haiz	ke	dinoñ	aur	unse	nazdeeki	
na	karo	jab	tak	pāk	na	ho leiñ	phir	jub	Pāk	
ho jāyeiñ	to	unke	pās	jāo	jahāñ	se	Allah	ne	tumheiñ hukm	diya	beshak	Allah	pasand	rakhta	hai	
bahut	tauba	karne	wāloñ	ko	aur	pasand	rakhta	hai	suthroñ	ko

arabicText: نِسَآؤُكُمْ حَرْثٌۭ لَّكُمْ فَأْتُوا۟ حَرْثَكُمْ أَنَّىٰ شِئْتُمْ ۖ وَقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّكُم مُّلَـٰقُوهُ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Your	women	are	a	 tillage	 for	you;	so	come	into	your	 tillage	as	you	will;	and	 first	perform	 the	
deeds	that	benefit	you;	and	keep	fearing	Allah,	and	know	well	that	you	have	to	meet	Him;	and	
(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	give	glad	tidings	to	the	Muslims
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumhāri	 aurteiñ	 tumhāre	liye	 khetiyāñ	 haiñ	 to	 āao	 apni	 kheti meiñ	jis	 tarah	 chāho	 aur	 apne	
bhale	ka	kām	pahle	karo	aur	Allah	se	darte	raho	aur	jān	rakho	ke	tumheiñ	us	se	milna	hai aur	
aey	Mehboob!	Bashārat	do	Imān	wāloñ	ko
